name: haydenbleasel/next-forge
description: Production-grade Turborepo template for Next.js apps.
readme: # next-forge **Production-grade Turborepo template for Next.js apps.** [next-forge](https://github.com/haydenbleasel/next-forge) is a [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) project boilerplate for modern web application. It is designed to be a comprehensive starting point for new apps, providing a solid, opinionated foundation with a minimal amount of configuration. Clone the repo using: ```sh npx next-forge@latest init [my-project] ``` Then read the [docs](https://docs.next-forge.com) for more information. Made with [contrib.rocks](https://contrib.rocks).
